description: Process non-processed time card time changes.
permissions: User must be an admin and permitted to update each referenced time card time change via the delegated TimeCardTimeChange policy; the action is denied if no time card time changes are found.
side_effects: Processes the specified time card time changes, updates related invoices, and may delete unprocessed time card time changes after processing; on failure it can enqueue an async retry.
validation_notes: --time-card-time-change-ids is required and must refer to existing time card time changes.

flags.name: --time-card-time-change-ids
flags.description: Time card time change IDs (required, comma-separated or repeated). Example: 123,456.
flags.validation: Must refer to existing time card time changes.

flags.name: --delete-unprocessed
flags.description: Delete unprocessed time card time changes after processing. Example: false.
